label: A3BC2_hP12_194_h_a_f-002
title: U$_{2}$Cr$_{3}$Si Structure
comments:
This is a ternary form of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_hP12_194_f_ah-001}{$C14$ hexagonal Laves structure}.  The ICSD lists the prototype ac $C14$/MgZn$_{2}$, so we chose U$_{2}$Cr$_{3}$Si as the prototype, as it has a readily available reference. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A3BC2_hP12_194_h_a_f-002}{U$_{2}$Cr$_{3}$Si}, AFLOW label A3BC2\_hP12\_194\_h\_a\_f-002, and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC3_hP12_194_f_a_h-001}{Ba$_{x}$Pt$_{3}$B$_{2}$}, A2BC3\_hP12\_194\_f\_a\_h, occupy the same Wyckoff positions in space group $P6_{3}/mmc$ \# 194. They differ in the c/a ratio, with U$_{2}$Cr$_{3}$Si having $c/a \approx 1.6$ and Ba$_{x}$Pt$_{3}$B$_{2}$ $c/a \approx 0.85$.
